string-array.name: array_of_dialogues
string-array.item: Hello! I’m Ace and I am a detective!
Mayor Bean needs our help solving the Mystery of the Missing Chocolate.
He is located in the Wild West.
Do you want to be my partner and help me solve this case?
Awesome! Now, we have a mystery to solve. It’s you and me in the Wild West.
Ace is on the case!

string-array.name: array_of_dialogues_scene2
string-array.item: Hello there! Good to see you in one piece. And in the right era.
Not that we had problems with time travel in the past…
Anyways…
We’ve been transported to the middle of the DESERT!
We should go find the nearby town and find Mayor Bean!
WAIT!
Now we can go find Mayor Bean in style.

string-array.name: array_of_dialogues_scene3
string-array.item: We need to find Mayor Bean!
Mayor Bean? MAYOR BEAAAAAN?
How do we find Mayor Bean now?
Did someone call my name?
Mayor Bean! It\’s a good thing we found you.
You mentioned in the telegram you needed help?
*yawns*
Ah yes.
We have a charity event tomorrow for the kids of our town.
But all the chocolate is gone!
That\'s why we need your help.
We are ready to help, chief.
We can start by looking at the crime scene.
I\’ll take you to my personal vault.

string-array.name: array_of_dialogues_scene4
string-array.item: Oh no!
I had the chocolate stashed behind all these gems and gold.
It’s all gone now!
We will help you solve this mystery, Mayor.
First thing we need to do is to analyze the crime scene.
Hey Buddy. We need to get to that pedestal.
Will you help me move all of these things around?
OK. Time to look for any clues we can find.

string-array.name: array_of_dialogues_scene5
string-array.item: Mayor Bean?
*yawns*
Yeees?
We found a wrapper with pieces of chocolate on it.
Someone unwrapped one and ate it right here!
So the chocolate was eaten!
Precisely.
We now need to find who ate all the chocolate.
*yawns*
Try asking the Sheriff about who has chocolate eating habits!
She usually hangs around town.
If you call her you can probably find her.
Her name is Sheriff Nugget.
She is very sweet. You’ll love her.
Even though she is not the brightest…
she will be able to help.
Ok! To the town we go!
To the nap I return!

string-array.name: array_of_dialogues_scene6
string-array.item: Hi! Are you the Sheriff?
Sheriff Nugget happy to assist! What’s your name?
My name is Detective Ace.
I’m helping the Mayor solve a mystery.
Have you seen anyone around with a lot of chocolate around their mouths?
Maybe someone who had chocolate on their paws?
OOoh! I see.
There are a few kids over here who might know what happened.
I’ll ask them
They don’t know anything.
Maybe the old coyote Jim!
He doesn’t know anything
This is so exciting! A mystery you say?
Yes, yes, we need to find the chocolate thieves.
Ahhhh I love chocolate.
I can’t remember the last time something this exciting happened!
But I don’t know how to help…
Maybe look in the mines for more clues?
A good idea!
Can you take me there?

string-array.name: array_of_dialogues_scene7
string-array.item: Alright.
I don’t see anything here that could be useful…
Maybe in those carts?
There’s no trace of chocolate here.
Let’s go find Sheriff Nugget again
Sheriff Nugget?
Present!
There was nothing at the mines.
Where else could we look for clues?
Not sure.
HMMMM
No clue.
How about I take you to the crime scene and you can see if I missed anything?
OK!

string-array.name: array_of_dialogues_scene8
string-array.item: Hello Mayor Bean
Ahh, Sheriff Nugget and Detective Ace.
Has my chocolate been found?
Not yet. We have no idea what to do from here.
I’m taking Sheriff Nugget to the crime scene to look for more clues.
Maybe she’ll see something?
Alright! Let me know what you find!
This is what is missing?
Yes, there was a pile of chocolate here 2 days ago.
And it just disappeared?
Yup
I have to tell you and the Mayor something really important.
Let’s walk back
Mayor Bean…
I ate your chocolate.
WHAT?
Hol’ up, why?
The chocolate was for the charity event on Friday!
Really? Nooo!
I had no idea!
I just saw the chocolate there…
And I REALLY wanted to eat it.
It was supposed to be a surprise for the kids!
I’m sorry Mayor Bean.
Ahh, it’s okay. I forgive you.
I’ll just ask Detective Ace to entertain the kids then.
Wait, Mayor!
I can make this right.
We have a day until the charity.
I’ll get my friend in the nearest town to send me some of his imported chocolate.
I’ll just pay him for all he has and ask him to send it over through the mines.
Again, I’m sorry. Meet me in the mines by sundown.

string-array.name: array_of_dialogues_scene9
string-array.item: I can’t believe Sheriff Nugget ate all of the chocolate!
She ate it without even asking?!
*yawns*
Everyone makes mistakes…
We need to forgive them as they do when we make mistakes.
Not only did she admit to it, she’s working hard to make it right, that takes courage.
That is true! I’m proud of her.
That’s the spirit my boy.
Now let’s go help with the chocolate!
Mayor! Ace! Over here!
Help me bring that cart over here
Come help us!
Let’s take it to the town.
Wait, Ms. Nugget
This is more than the chocolate we lost.
I know. I wanted to apologize.
After explaining the situation to my friend, Charlie and her grandkids, they helped me get more chocolate.
She usually stocks up on chocolate for her grandkids,
But after hearing about the charity event they decided to share all of what they had this year.
They are very thankful for what they have, and they wanted to help others feel happy too!
Thank you Ms. Nugget. I really appreciate that.
And I am really thankful for your help, Mr. Ace.
If it wasn’t for you, we would have never known.
Let’s go into town.
This chocolate is amazing. Thank you Sheriff Nugget!
Thank you, Ace. I didn’t realize that the chocolate wasn’t just there for anyone to eat.
You’ve helped me make things right. And you made it in time to help these kids have a great thanksgiving.
Just doing my job!
I have to go back to my time now.
But it was great meeting you, Sheriff.
I will always remember you, and how important it is to work to make things right.
Goodbye Mayor Bean! I learned a lot today thanks to you!
My boy, remember to come visit sometime soon! I promise I will be mostly awake to greet you.
Maybe by Christmas, Mr. Bean.
I got a call I’m needed to help people who won’t stop dancing.
Gotta admit I’m curious!
Haha, go onto your adventure then, my boy. Goodbye!
